member.summary: Gets the session id from the http request.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Personalization.Common.IUserSessionService.ResetSessionIfChangedUser(System.String,System.Web.HttpContextBase)
member.summary: Resets the current session and CUID if changed user.
member.param: The email address of the logged in user, or null if no user logged in
member.returns: True if the session was reset, otherwise False.
member.remarks: This is called before a tracking request is created, to handle the case where a session has been associated with user X, but X has logged off and user Y has logged in. In this case we need to reset the session and request a new CUID. Otherwise we would associate tracking data coming from user Y, with user X instead.
